name: 1 Step, 1 Jump
description:
Step and jump your way through obstacles.

Step, jump, step, jump, step, jump. I know the order is difficult to remember, but please do try to! The goal is to reach the portal rotating thing and turn into nothingness into it! Don't know why that would be a goal for someone, but it is!

The character knows himself that this game is silly, as you'll see.

Finish the levels in less and less moves, and less and less time. Share your scores and have fun!
